branchCategory.name: VCHR
branchCategory.description: <P>Designed for use with air or inert gas, SMC's VCHR can operate up to a maximum pressure of 6.0 MPa with a set range of 0.5 to 5.0 MPa.  With large flow passages, and IS01179-1 conforming port thread sizes, high flow rates are ensured.  A metal-sealed relief valve, and a polyurethane elastomer poppet improve durability.  Expected service life is approximately 10 million cycles.</P>

branchItem.name: VCHR, Direct Operated Regulator for 6.0 MPa (Relieving Type)
branchItem.description: <P>Designed for use with air or inert gas, SMC's VCHR can operate up to a maximum pressure of 6.0 MPa with a set range of 0.5 to 5.0 MPa.  With large flow passages, and IS01179-1 conforming port thread sizes, high flow rates are ensured.  A metal-sealed relief valve, and a polyurethane elastomer poppet improve durability.  Expected service life is approximately 10 million cycles.</P>
